methods.name: GetClusterHardwareInfo
methods.documentation: You can use the GetClusterHardwareInfo method to retrieve the hardware status and information for all Fibre Channel nodes, iSCSI nodes and drives in the cluster. This generally includes manufacturers, vendors, versions, and other associated hardware identification information.

params.name: type
params.documentation: Include only a certain type of hardware information in the response. Can be one of the following:drives: List only drive information in the response.nodes: List only node information in the response.all: Include both drive and node information in the response.If this parameter is omitted, a type of "all" is assumed.

methods.documentation: GetHardwareConfig enables you to display the hardware configuration information for a node. NOTE: This method is available only through the per-node API endpoint 5.0 or later.
methods.name: GetHardwareConfig
GetNodeHardwareInfo
methods.documentation: GetNodeHardwareInfo is used to return all the hardware info and status for the node specified. This generally includes manufacturers, vendors, versions, and other associated hardware identification information.

params.name: nodeID
params.documentation: The ID of the node for which hardware information is being requested.  Information about a  node is returned if a   node is specified.

methods.name: GetNvramInfo
methods.documentation: GetNvramInfo allows you to retrieve information from each node about the NVRAM card.

params.documentation: The "force" parameter must be included on this method to successfully run on all nodes in the cluster.
params.name: force

members.documentation: Hardware information for all nodes and drives in the cluster. Each object in this output is labeled with the nodeID of the given node.
members.name: clusterHardwareInfo

members.documentation: List of hardware information and current settings.
members.name: hardwareConfig

members.documentation: Hardware information for the specified nodeID. Each object in this output is labeled with the nodeID of the given node.
members.name: nodeHardwareInfo

members.documentation: Arrays of events and errors detected on the NVRAM card.
members.name: nvramInfo

types.documentation: The hardwareInfo object contains detailed information about the hardware and status of each node in the cluster.  You can retrieve this information with the API method GetHardwareInfo.
types.name: hardwareInfo

members.documentation: Motherboard media bus information.
members.name: bus

members.documentation: A list of information for each drive in the node.
members.name: driveHardware

members.documentation: A list of  ports on the node.
members.name: fibreChannelPorts

members.documentation: Motherboard peripheral configuration information.
members.name: hardwareConfig

members.documentation: The crash dump configuration of the operating system kernel.
members.name: kernelCrashDumpState

members.documentation: Firmware and system memory hardware information.
members.name: memory

members.documentation: Descriptions of the hardware of each of the node's network interfaces.
members.name: network

members.documentation: The status of the node's network interfaces.
members.name: networkInterfaces

members.documentation: NVRAM statistics for the node.
members.name: nvram

members.documentation: The vendor of the motherboard.
members.name: origin

members.documentation: A description of the chassis platform.
members.name: platform

members.documentation: The serial number of the chassis.
members.name: serial

members.documentation: Storage controller information.
members.name: storage

members.documentation: Operating system memory usage and performance information.
members.name: sysinfo

members.documentation: The type of node chassis.
members.name: system

members.documentation: The unique ID of the node.
members.name: uuid
